content: Hi, Im looking for the ngallery module that is used in this Pangeo WRF example to convert the data structure to an xarray Dataset, but I cannot find it. Is it part existing environment (looked at cmip6 and pangeo and not there). Conda search can't find it either. Maybe I have the conda module name wrong? Thanks! https://gallery.pangeo.io/repos/NCAR/notebook-gallery/notebooks/Run-Anywhere/WRF/wrf_ex.html#

Hi Rich, the conda environment showing what to install to run the example is here:
https://github.com/NCAR/notebook-gallery/blob/main/environment.yml
Instructions on getting it to run on your local machine are provided in the repo README file.
Note that the ngallery_utils module is used only for downloading example WRF data. If you have WRF data already, you don't need the module.
